metadata.title: CVE-2022-32990 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
An issue in gimp_layer_invalidate_boundary of GNOME GIMP 2.10.30 allowsattackers to trigger an unhandled exception via a crafted XCF file, causinga Denial of Service (DoS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.10.32-1
gimp-data - 2.10.32-1
libgimp2.0t64 - 2.10.32-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10.32-1').
